extendedInfo.description: The Best Shopping List for Christmas! Organize and manage your gift list by person and keep track of which gifts you've still to purchase and how much you're spending!This year Christmas Gifts Manager, also known as My Christmas Shopping List, is available on Android for the first time! After the success of this app in other platforms, we've decided to port the app also on Android.FEATURES:- Add persons to which you've to purchase christmas' gifts- Add gifts to each person and change its avatar choosing from the available cute images- Keep track of how much money you are speding for each person and in total.- See which gifts you've already purchased and which gifts you've still to buy: you'll not forget to purchase any gift this year thanks to Christmas Gifts Manager!
